name: Imaginary Dungeon (Enpeace)
description:
Welcome to this little game made for the Brackeys 2022 game jam. 

This is a little shoot-em up game where you play as a little bean defending itself from ghosts, the illuminati and evil hands. You live in the complex plane and can multiply your position with i. Collect score multipliers and get the highest score possible!

Controls:

Movement: wasd / arrow keys

Multiply with i: Hold right-click to preview, release to confirm or hold shift while releasing to cancel

Shooting: Left-click

If you want to read/know more about complex numbers:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Complex_number

The art, music and scripts were all made by me

The game engine is Unity,

For the art I used LibreSprite,

And for the music FL Studio 20
